member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.CalculateTaxlotValues(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IFeature@,ESRI.ArcGIS.Carto.IFeatureLayer@)
member.summary: Calculates Taxlot values from ORMAPMapnum.
member.param: A feature from the Taxlot feature class.
The Map Index feature layer.
member.remarks: Updates the ORMAP fields in to reflect the current ORMAP Number and Map Number elements in the overlaying polygon.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.ConvertCodeValueDomainToCode(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IFields,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a domain descriptive value to the stored code.
member.param: An field collection object that supports the IFields interface.
A field that exists in fields.
A coded name to convert to a coded value
member.returns: A string that represents the domain coded value that corresponds with the coded value name (), or a empty string.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.ConvertCodeValueDomainToDescription(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IFields,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a code index to the domain descriptive value.
member.param: An field collection object that supports the IFields interface.
A field that exists in fields.
A coded value to covert to a coded name.
member.returns: A string that represents the domain coded name that corresponds with the coded value name (), or empty string.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.FindFeatureLayerByDSName(System.String)
member.summary: Locate a feature layer by its dataset name.
member.param: The name of the dataset to find.
member.returns: A layer object of that supports the IFeatureLayer interface.
member.remarks: Searches in the TOC recursively (i.e. within group layers). Returns the first Feature Layer with a matching dataset name.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.GetRelatedObjects(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IObject)
member.summary: Retrieve a feature-linked annotation feature.
member.param: An initialized geodatabase object.
member.returns: An object that supports the IFeature interface.

remarks.para: Finds all related objects to the feature through the first found relationship class, and returns the first related object as the return value.
This is optimized for annotation because there is a single relationship class.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.GetSelectedFeatures(ESRI.ArcGIS.Carto.IFeatureLayer)
member.summary: Return a feature cursor of the selected features of the specified layer.
member.param: The feature layer to return the selection from
member.returns: An object that supports the IFeatureCursor interface.
member.remarks: References the currently selected features in layer, and returns a feature cursor with the selected features in it.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.GetValueViaOverlay(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IGeometry@,ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IFeatureClass@,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Overlay the passed in feature with a feature class to get a value from the specified field.
member.param: The search geometry.
Overlaying feature class.
Name of field to return value for.
Name of field to order by in the case of a tie in area/length of intersection.
member.returns: Returns the value from the specified field (valueFieldName) as a string.
member.remarks: Gets the target feature with the largest area of intersection with the geometry and gets its value from the field, or, if tied (unikely but possible), then gets the best (lowest) value from the field, based on the order by field value.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.HasSelectedFeatures(ESRI.ArcGIS.Carto.IFeatureLayer)
member.summary: Determines if the feature layer has a selection
member.param: An object that supports the IFeatureLayer
member.returns: True or False
member.remarks: Checking the selection set of layer, determine if one, many, or no features are selected.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.IsTaxlot(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IObject)
member.summary: Determine if the feature belongs to the Taxlot feature class.
member.param: A valid initialized geodatabase object.
member.returns: True or False.
member.remarks: Determine if thisObject belongs to the Taxlot feature class by checking the name of the dataset of thisObject feature class against the Taxlot Feature Class constant.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.IsMapIndex(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IObject)
member.summary: Determine if the feature belongs to the MapIndex feature class.
member.param: A valid initialized geodatabase object.
member.returns: True or False.
member.remarks: Compares the name of the dataset of the feature class to the Map Index layer name in order to determine if it is the MapIndex feature class.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.IsAnno(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IObject)
member.summary: Determine if a feature is annotation.
member.param: A valid initialized geodatabase object.
member.returns: True or False.
member.remarks: Compares the feature type of with that of annotation and return the truth value of the comparison.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.LoadFCIntoMap(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the specified feature class into the current map.
member.param: The feature class to find.
An alternate title for the file dialog box.
member.returns: True for found and loaded, False for not found and loaded.
member.remarks: Show a dialog box with title that allows the user to select the personal geodatabase that the resides in. The feature class featureClassName is then loaded in the current map from the chosen personal geodatabase.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.ReadValue(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IRow@,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a value from a row, given a field name.
member.param: An object that implements the IRow interface
A field that exists in row
A string value indicating data type of the field
member.remarks: Reads the value of a field with a domain and translates the value from the coded value to the coded name.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.UpdateAutoFields(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IFeature@)
member.summary: Update Auto fields in a feature class.
member.param: An object that implements the Ifeature interface
member.remarks: Update the AutoWho and the AutoDate fields with the current username and date/time, respectively.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.ValidateTaxlotNumber(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IGeometry@)
member.summary: Determine the validity of a taxlot number
member.param: The taxlot value to validate
The geometry of the feature to check
member.returns: True or False
member.remarks: Determine if the feature represented by thisGeometry with taxlot taxlotNumber is a unique and therefore valid.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.AttributeQuery(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.ITable@,System.String@)
member.summary: Return a cursor that represents the results of an attribute query
member.param: An object that supports the ITable interface
An Sql Where clause
member.returns: Return a cursor that represents the results of an attribute query
member.remarks: Creates a cursor from table that contains all feature records that meet the criteria in whereClause

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.CandidateKeysToDelimitedString(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.Double}@)
member.summary: Converts the list of candidate dictionary keys to a string in the format of a comma-delimited list.
member.param: A dictionary of integer candidate ids for keys.
member.returns: A string in the format of a comma-delimited list.
member.remarks: An empty dictionary will return as an empty string.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.DoSpatialQuery(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IFeatureClass@,ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IGeometry@,ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.esriSpatialRelEnum@,System.String@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Return a feature cursor based on the results of a spatial query
member.param: Feature class to search
Geometry to search in relation to spatialRelation
Geometry relationship to searchGeometry
SQL Where clause
Read/Write state of the return cursor
member.returns: Returns a feature cursor that represents the results of the spatial query
member.remarks: Given a feature class, pFeatureClassIn, a search geometry, pSearchGeometry, a spatial relationship, lSpatialRelation, an Sql search statement, sWhereClause, and whether or not the returned cursor should be updateable, bUpdateable. Perform a spatial query on pFeatureClassIn where feature which meet criteria sWhereClause have a relationship of lSpatialRelation to pSearchGeometry. The returned cursor is updatable if bUpdateable is True.

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.EnvelopeToPolygon(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IEnvelope@)
member.summary: Copy envelope points to polygon
member.returns: A Polygon

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.GetAnnoSizeByScale(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determine the annotation size based on scale
member.param: Feature class to find the proper annotation size for
The scale of the feature class
member.returns: A double that represents the proper scale factor
member.remarks: Determines the proper size for the text in thisFeatureClassName. Defaults at size 5 is the scale is invalid, and size 10 if thisFeatureClassName is not Taxlot Acreage Annotation or Taxlot Number Annotation

member.name: M:OrmapTaxlotEditing.SpatialUtilities.GetCenterOfEnvelope(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IEnvelope@)
member.summary: Determine the x and y coordinates of the center of envelope, and return them as a Point object
member.param: An envelope object of type IEnvelope
member.returns: A Point object that represents the center of the envelope
